item.title: First Post!
item.description: Hello, world! Hey there! Welcome to my blog, where I will be documenting my projects. I am an electrical engineer by trade, so many of my projects will involve hacking together electronic gadgets, but I also have a wide array of interests ranging from rock climbing to RC aircraft, which may also make an appearance on this blog. I have recently spent a bit of time improving my online presence.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is John Boyd. I am an electrical engineer by trade and a hacker at heart. I worked in the semiconductor industry for a few years as an analog & mixed signal design engineer, but lately my career has followed my passion for embedded systems design. I now work as CTO and lead hardware engineer at Knocki, a fun startup trying new ideas in the IoT space.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to reach out to me via email at johnboydiv@gmail.com. Connect with me on LinkedIn. Check out my Resume.
